channel.title: [Delta] Login error | anyone help plz | need extremly help [Delta] rep++
channel.description:
umm... when i try to login to the server i use, i get this error on the source cmd :S

item.title: [Delta] Login error | anyone help plz | need extremly help [Delta] rep++
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:2, topic:426840”]Take a look at this:

Your server doesn’t like it when your arrays are “out of bounds”. If I’m not mistaken, that -10000 is a coordinate, right? Try increasing the maximum size of your coordinates. Did you add anything recently?[/quote]
I don’t think the coords could be that high.

Post the the method getFlag().

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Login error | anyone help plz | need extremly help [Delta] rep++

item.title: [Delta] Login error | anyone help plz | need extremly help [Delta] rep++
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Take a look at this:

Your server doesn’t like it when your arrays are “out of bounds”. If I’m not mistaken, that -10000 is a coordinate, right? Try increasing the maximum size of your coordinates. Did you add anything recently?

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Login error | anyone help plz | need extremly help [Delta] rep++
